mapper.sql: id, parent_id parentId, album_id albumId, code, create_time createTime, last_revamp_time lastRevampTime
mapper.update: UPDATE base_nice SET parent_id = #{parentId}, code = #{code}, album_id = #{albumId},last_revamp_time=#{lastRevampTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE base_nice SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.album_id id,b.album_name albumName,(select count(id) from base_recording where album_id = a.album_id) count,c.url url,m.username,b.detail FROM base_nice a left join base_album b on a.album_id = b.id LEFT join base_file c on a.album_id = c.purpose_id and c.type='image' and c.purpose='album' left join base_member m on m.id = b.user_id where a.del_flag = 0 and a.parent_id = #{id} order by a.code, a.create_time desc LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
